Gold.en: An attack that may inflict a burn.

Silver.en: An attack that may inflict a burn.

Crystal.en: An attack that may inflict a burn.

Ruby.en: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Sapphire.en: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Emerald.en: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

FireRed.en: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.
FireRed.de: Schwache Feuer-Attacke, die evtl. den Gegner verbrennt.

LeafGreen.en: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.
LeafGreen.de: Schwache Feuer-Attacke, die evtl. den Gegner verbrennt.

Diamond.en: The foe is attacked with small flames. The target may also be left with a burn.
Diamond.de: Schwache Feuer-Attacke, die eventuell den Gegner verbrennt.

Pearl.de: Schwache Feuer-Attacke, die eventuell den Gegner verbrennt.

SoulSilver.de: Schwache Feuer-Attacke, die eventuell den Gegner verbrennt.

Black.de: Schwache Feuer-Attacke, durch die das Ziel eventuell Verbrennungen erleidet.
